about.title: About me.
about.body:
"I am a passionate full-stack web developer with experience in a wide range of technologies and frameworks, including React, Next.js, Redux, TypeScript, Node.js, NestJS, Express, GraphQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Css, Figma, and more.

My meticulous attention to detail and passion for innovation combine to create robust and engaging solutions.

I am always eager to explore new technologies and bring my energy to every project. I am ready to take your ideas to the next level!"

dataQuest.title: Tools
dataQuest.body: With an insatiable curiosity, I delve into essential tools like Figma to transform ideas into immersive designs. Furthermore, I employ tools such as npm, ESLint, and Prettier to refine code quality, and leverage Bash and Git for a seamless workflow. I am always ready to bring your visions to life with a touch of technical excellence.

dataQuest.title: Testing
dataQuest.body:
Testing isn't just a phase in my development process; it's a cornerstone of ensuring quality and reliability.
I understand that a solid testing strategy can make or break a project, which is why I embrace testing tools like Jest, React Testing Library, Puppeteer, Cypress, and Vitest.
By meticulously crafting and executing tests, I ensure that each feature is rigorously validated before it reaches the user.
I also leverage powerful tools like GitHub Actions and Docker for isolated environments, allowing me to confidently explore different scenarios without compromising stability.
Testing isn't an afterthought for me â€“ it's a commitment to delivering excellence and building products that stand the test of time.
